data.name: Heatran

attacks.name: Fire Fang
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Magma Mantle
attacks.text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. This attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage for each Fire or Metal Energy card you discarded.

data.flavorText: Its body is made of rugged steel. However, it is partially melted in spots because of its own heat.

attacks.name: Heat Boiler
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is a Water Pokémon, this attack does 60 damage plus 40 more damage.

data.name: Heatran

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Fire Spin
attacks.text: Discard 2 Basic Energy cards attached to Heatran. (If you can't discard cards, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

data.name: Heatran-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Heat Boiler
attacks.text: If this Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Dynamite Press
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Plasma Energy attached to it, this attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.

data.name: Heatran

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Fire Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to Heatran. This power can't be used if Heatran is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Magma Storm
attacks.text: You may discard as many basic Energy cards as you like attached to Heatran. If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each Energy card you discarded.

data.flavorText: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

data.name: Heatran

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Boiling Impact
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Boiling blood, like magma, circulates through its body. It makes its dwelling place in volcanic caves.

data.name: Heatran

attacks.name: Fire Fang
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Raging Flare
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Boiling blood, like magma, circulates through its body. It makes its dwelling place in volcanic caves.

data.name: Heatran LV.X
rules: Put this card onto your Active Heatran. Heatran LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.

abilities.name: Heat Metal
abilities.text: Your opponent can't remove the Special Condition Burned by evolving or devolving his or her Burned Pokémon. (This also includes putting a Pokémon Level-Up card onto the Burned Pokémon.) Whenever your opponent flips a coin for the Special Condition Burned between turns, treat it as tails.

abilities.name: Heat Wave
abilities.text: Once at the end of your turn, if Heatran is on your Bench, you may use this power. If you discarded basic Energy cards attached to your Fire or Metal Active Pokémon by using that Pokémon's attack this turn, attach up to 2 of those Energy cards to that Pokémon.

data.name: Heatran-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Burning Road
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when this Pokémon moves from your Bench to become your Active Pokémon, you may move any number of Fire Energy from your other Pokémon to it.

attacks.name: Hot Burn-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage times the amount of Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Heatran

abilities.name: Smelt
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Metal Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to Heatran. This power can't be used if Heatran is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Heavy Metal
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Metal Energy attached to Heatran. This attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

data.flavorText: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

data.name: Heatran

attacks.name: Lava Burn
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Heat Bazooka
attacks.text: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck.

data.flavorText: Boiling blood, like magma, circulates through its body. It makes its dwelling place in volcanic caves.

data.name: Heatran

attacks.name: Steel Drop
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Steam Blast
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

attacks.name: Steelworks
attacks.text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and attach any number of Metal Energy cards you find there to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

attacks.name: Steel Tackle
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Magma Fall
attacks.text: If you have a Stadium in play, this attack does 90 more damage.

rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Magma Gain
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if you have a Stadium in play, you may heal 50 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Max Heat Burst
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

rules: Radiant Pokémon Rule: You can't have more than 1 Radiant Pokémon in your deck.

data.name: Heatran

abilities.name: Incandescent Body
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Steel Burst
attacks.text: Discard all Metal Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 50 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

data.flavorText: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

attacks.name: Iron Buster
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.
